Jane Winter Interview – The Princess Of Sales . Want to finally smash down the barriers that have been holding you back from big sales? In this interview Jane talks about the Number 1 thing, that if you master it, will dramatically influence not only your sales but every aspect of your life!!!

Yvette Buhagiar - App Budgie, Episode #12

http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com/people/yvette-buhagiar-app-budgie-episode-12

The Peter Montgomery Show Episode #12. Today on the show: Yvette Buhagiar, founder of App Budgie has DONE just about every kind of marketing there is in her extensive business and marketing career and talks about why she believes Phone Apps Trump The Lot. For Schools, Business AND Non Profits. See you on the inside…via http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com

Louis Lautman Interview - The YES Movie, Episode #13

http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com/people/louis-lautman-interview-the-yes-movie-episode-13

The Peter Montgomery Show Episode #13 Louis Lautman, Executive Producer of The YES Movie interviewed about 100 of the worlds most successful YOUNG self-made millionaires and entrepreneur experts because he was so curious to find out exactly how a young person makes millions of dollars. He wants to share their strategies with YOU. He says the movie’s “…kinda like The Secret on STEROIDS meets MTV. It’s not a boring talking head documentary it’s really an inspirational film”. Hit play now and check him out…

David Siteman Garland - The Rise To The Top On The Peter Mon

http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com/people/david-siteman-garland-interview-the-rise-to-the-top-episode-14/

On this weeks episode: David Siteman Garland Creator of ‘The Rise To The Top’ THE #1 Non Boring Business Show. Dave’s mission is to help you have success turning your passion into a badass brand (especially online) The guest list on his show reads like your bookshelf… Seth Godin, Tim Ferriss, Gary Vaynerchuk, Tony Hsieh and on and on...307 in fact.

Dr Rich Schuttler Interview - The Organizational Troubleshoo

http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com/people/dr-rich-schuttler-interview-the-organizational-troubleshooter-episode-15/

Dr Richard Schuttler The Organizational Troubleshooter has been working with people and organizations for 25 years. Helping them to understand how to be more efficient and effective so that their processes can be streamlined to get better results quicker, with what Dr Rich calls incremental gains: small successes over a long period of time achieves big goals. Check it out here...via http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com

Alison Skate Interview - The Commitment Queen, Episode #16

http://thepetermontgomeryshow.com/people/alison-skate-interview-the-commitment-queen-episode-16

Alison Skate The Commitment Queen is an executive workplace coach who helps professionals in their field who get promoted because of their technical skills, develop into leaders. With 15 years experience as a psychologist working in organisational settings, including 5 years as an officer with the Australian Army, Alison is definitely worth paying attention to.
